## Installation

You can install the latest release of `jmf` from [GitHub](https://github.com/jmf-vienna/jmf-r/) with:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("jmf-vienna/jmf-r@*release")
```

## Usage

```{r}
library(jmf)
quiet()
library(tidyverse)
```
